description:
A day on the slopes is more fun for the whole family when little shredders are cozy and warm. Made from a thick merino blend, the Paragon socks have strategically placed ventilation, so little feet stay the right temperature from the first chair to the last.

  • Stretchy merino blend is light and warm
  • drirelease® certified mulesing-free merino wool wicks away moisture
  • Ventilated forefoot lets toes breathe
  • Reinforced heels and toes add strength where it is needed most
  • Flat seams eliminate potential hot spots
  • All over cushioning provides all day comfort
name: Kombi Paragon Jr Socks - Children to Youths
